text: thumbnail Dr. Avshalom Kor () (born 17 September 1950) is an Israeli linguist and expert on Hebrew grammar and semantics. He is known to provide upon request, the grammatical root of any given Hebrew word and/or name along with its Biblical origins and contextual references. He is probably best known as an authority on the gender of Hebrew words and the proper usage of suffixes and plural extensions. He has a daily show on Israel army radio (Galey Tzahal) and a weekly show on Israeli TV Channel 1. He also made a guest appearance in Episode 14 Season 3 of Srugim.http://srugimrecap.wordpress.com/2012/01/28/srugim- season-3-episode-14-srugim-has-a-first-born-masculine-child/ ==Published books== *(2004).
